REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Exempts clothing and footwear sold in New York city from all sales taxes
Summary: Exempts clothing and footwear sold in New York city from all state and local sales taxes including items used or consumed to make or repair such clothing and which becomes a physical component part of such clothing.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to sales tax on clothing and footwear in cities with a population of one million or more
